channel.title: Changing what Items NPC's drop when killed
channel.description: Im not going to lie, I am almost completely clueless when it comes to this, All I need to know is what to go into and what to add/change.

item.title: Changing what Items NPC's drop when killed

item.description:

Hey man, no problem.
We were all there once.
Check out all your Beginners tutorials in one.
Look for NPC Drops.
Check it out.
Should help a lot.

Read full topic
